hero.heading: Transform Poses Instantly
hero.description: Enter your prompt to seamlessly apply new poses to existing subjects in your images.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Change the person's pose to a sitting position, make them dance, show a jumping pose...

items.title: Instant Transformation

howItWorks.heading: How It Works

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop your photo or browse files. Compatible with JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Pose Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI analyzes the image and applies the desired pose to the subject seamlessly.

items.title: Download Your Edit

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: I transformed my family photos into fun action shots. The process was shockingly easy!

items.name: David Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Pose Transfer

items.title: What kind of poses can I apply?
items.description: You can instruct the AI to apply a variety of poses, from natural stances to dynamic motions like jumping or dancing, based on your creative vision.

items.title: Is it free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user gets 30 free credits daily, allowing for numerous transformations. Additional credits can be earned through activities on our Discord server.

items.title: Can I use images for commercial purposes?
items.description: Absolutely! Users on any subscription plan can use their transformed images for commercial projects, while free-tier users can use them for personal enjoyment.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All processing happens locally in your browser, meaning your images are never uploaded or stored online. Your privacy is our priority.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Poses?
footer.description: Try AI Pose Transfer now and unleash your creativity. No sign-up needed.
